url.description: The URL of the API to use, if it has GET parameters to send with the request, Example1: /{id}  Example2: email={email}&phone={phone}  Note:  the data between braces correspond to the fields of the contract

method.description: The method of the API to use, Example: GET, POST

body_format.description: The format of the body to send with the request

body.description: Json of Body to send with the request with pair data:freshdesk_field. Example: {"myemail": "email", "myphone": "phone"}

waiting_text.description:
The text to display while waiting for the response. Can use Html syntax. Example:

Waiting for response...
